Sinopse: Hope has always been close to her daughter Lacy. But since her divorce from her husband, Hope has been worried about Lacy, who is struggling to cope. But when Cassie begins to drive a wedge between Lacy and her mother, Hope begins to wonder if Cassie is the godsend she first imagined.—Dawn's Light
